title: Rambles in Europe:
author: Morrison, Leonard Allison
snippet: I passed through the towns of Cushendall and Glenarm,  through the county of Antrim, which is one of the purest Scotch settlements.

title: Rambles in Europe ... With historical facts relating to Scotch-American families, gathered in Scotland and the North of Ireland ... Illustrated

title: Great Britain, France and Belgium: a short tour in 1835
author: Humphrey, Heman
snippet: By far the most interesting route is bythe coast, through Carrickfergus, Ballycarry, Larne,Glenarm, Cairnlough, Ballycastle and Ballintoy.
